context_bundle.summary: GitLab CI/CD: .gitlab-ci.yml in repo root. Structure: stages, jobs, scripts. Jobs run in stages (build, test, deploy). Runners execute jobs. Variables for config. artifacts for passing files between jobs. cache for dependencies. Use rules for conditional execution.

onboarding.quick_start: GitLab CI: .gitlab-ci.yml with stages/jobs. stages: [build, test, deploy]. Jobs: script (commands), stage (placement), only/except (triggers). artifacts: paths to pass between jobs. cache: paths to cache (node_modules). image: docker image for runner. rules for conditions.
